name: Blastazoid
description:
Hey everyone!

I made this project in under 5 hours for the 2022 Juice Jam - I challenged myself to create the simplest game I could as fast as I could, while making it feel as satisfying to play as possible. I wanted to make a stressbuster game that's just relaxing to play. How did I do?

CONTROLS: Hit the Space Bar when the outer ring lines up with the ring in the center - make sure you time it perfectly!

NOTE: The browser version may run a little slow depending on your hardware, but the downloadable always runs at the right speed.

Feel free to leave a comment - I'm always looking for feedback!

 (or brag about your high score!)

Thanks for playing!
